name: A song for ducks
description:
A little reflection on grief.

Made for Mini Jam 107 with theme Music² and constraint Gravity is Under Your Control and for bitsy game jam with theme duck.

Made with bipsi + custom hacks.

This wasn't easy to come up with, I hope you'll enjoy it. I think I'm gonna take a break from game jams for a while.

All art (images, music, text) by me
